description: Getting a list of actions by start-date

requests.curl:
curl "http://umdp-cabo-verde.herokuapp.com/api/actions?start_date=2016-01-31" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/undp-cabo-verde-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: undp-cabo-verde.herokuapp.com" \
	-H "Cookie: "
